EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Data_Workshop_Roadshow_2015.Minneapolis Cancellation
EmailTemplate.subject: Postponed: Pivotal Big Data Roadshow in Minneapolis
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow in Minneapolis.
We are currently updating the agenda and adding new speakers. In order to accommodate these changes, we have decided to postpone this event to a later date.
When the new date is determined, you will receive another email with details and additional information. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you.
Should you have any questions or concerns please contact Paul Santos <mailto:paulsantos@pivotal.io>.
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
